languages.text:
If at least one leashmaster is dead the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}.
It also cyber-mastiff gains bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for each dead leashmaster.

traits.locale_text:
If at least one leashmaster is dead the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}.
It also cyber-mastiff gains bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for each dead leashmaster.

languages.text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда в бою впервые погибает арбитр-псарь, кибермастиф получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атаку в ход{/g}. Когда погибает любой арбитр-псарь, кибермастиф получает суммирующиеся бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever any leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses to their Weapon Skill and Strength and +1 attack per turn.

When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Когда в бою впервые погибает арбитр-псарь, кибермастиф получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атаку в ход{/g}. Когда погибает любой арбитр-псарь, кибермастиф получает суммирующиеся бонусы к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Siber mastif, çatışmada ilk kez bir Tasmacı öldürüldüğünde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} kazanır. Siber mastif, ne zaman bir Tasmacı öldürülse {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliklerine üst üste birikebilen bonuslar kazanır.
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, çatışmada ilk kez bir Tasmacı öldürüldüğünde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} kazanır. Siber mastif, ne zaman bir Tasmacı öldürülse {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliklerine üst üste birikebilen bonuslar kazanır.

languages.text: Cuando muere un amo adiestrador por primera vez durante un combate, el cibermastín gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataque por turno{/g}. Cada vez que muera cualquier amo adiestrador, el cibermastín gana bonificaciones acumulativas a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando muere un amo adiestrador por primera vez durante un combate, el cibermastín gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataque por turno{/g}. Cada vez que muera cualquier amo adiestrador, el cibermastín gana bonificaciones acumulativas a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 当战斗中首次有训犬师被杀死时，生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合额外获得1次攻击次数{/g}。此外，每当有训犬师被杀死时，生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}都会提高，此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当战斗中首次有训犬师被杀死时，生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合额外获得1次攻击次数{/g}。此外，每当有训犬师被杀死时，生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}都会提高，此效果可叠加。

languages.text: La première fois qu'un maître-mastiff est tué, le cyber-mastiff gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g}. Chaque fois qu'un maître-mastiff est tué, le cyber-mastiff gagne des bonus cumulables à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La première fois qu'un maître-mastiff est tué, le cyber-mastiff gagne +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g}. Chaque fois qu'un maître-mastiff est tué, le cyber-mastiff gagne des bonus cumulables à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: リーシュマスターが戦闘で初めて倒されると、サイバーマスチフは{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターン毎の攻撃回数{/g}+1を付与される。リーシュマスターのいずれかが倒されると、サイバーマスチフはその{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}にスタックボーナスを獲得する。
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リーシュマスターが戦闘で初めて倒されると、サイバーマスチフは{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターン毎の攻撃回数{/g}+1を付与される。リーシュマスターのいずれかが倒されると、サイバーマスチフはその{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}にスタックボーナスを獲得する。

languages.text: Wird ein Leinenmeister im Kampf erstmals getötet, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Zug{/g}. Wird ein Leinenmeister getötet, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff kumulative Boni auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a Leashmaster is killed for the first time in combat, the cyber-mastiff gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Whenever any Leashmaster is killed, the cyber-mastiff gains stacking bonuses to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Wird ein Leinenmeister getötet, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff kumulative Boni auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
